attributes.action: Prioritise emergency services for COVID-19 Vaccine
attributes.additional_details:
The public services put their lives on the line every day to aid the general public when they are at their worst. We do not get the option to refuse service to people based on a COVID-19 infection. We also have families at home who are put in greater risk of infection as a result of our sacrifice. 
I ask you to help the people who help us.
attributes.background: I would like the government to prioritise the emergency services for the coronavirus vaccine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564155
